city.cs.engine

Class BodyImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • city.cs.engine.BodyImage

  • public class BodyImage
extends Object
    Images to use for rendering a Body. The same image can be shared by multiple bodies. An image is attached to a body by creating an AttachedImage, which provides the ability to scale, translate, rotate and flip images. By default the image is displayed in full, which usually requires an image having a transparent background, with the visible part approximating the shape of the simulated body; alternatively, a body may be configured to clip images to its outline.
    See Also:
    Body.setClipped(boolean)
